name: Detailed Discussion Notes
description: Comprehensive notes organized by discussion topics with key points, technical details, and action items with checkboxes.

sections.title: Overview
sections.instruction: Provide a brief overview summarizing the core topic and objective of the discussion in 3-5 bullet points. Each bullet should capture one high-level takeaway.

sections.title: Detailed Discussion by Topic
sections.instruction: Break down the discussion into logical topics. For each topic, create a ### subheading and list the key points as bullet items. Preserve technical details, specific numbers, parameters, and concrete examples mentioned. Use sub-bullets for supporting details. Organize topics in the order they were discussed. Typically 3-6 topics depending on the meeting length.

sections.title: Action Items
sections.instruction: List all action items, tasks, and next steps mentioned. Each item should be a checkbox (- [ ]) with the responsible person if mentioned. Include concrete deliverables and any deadlines or conditions discussed.
